Package com.epam.esm.giftCertificate

Interface GiftCertificateRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<GiftCertificate,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<GiftCertificate,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<GiftCertificate,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<GiftCertificate,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<GiftCertificate,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<GiftCertificate>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<GiftCertificate,Long>
@Repository public interface GiftCertificateRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<GiftCertificate,Long>
Author:
orest uzhytchak A repository layer for gift certificate

    • getGiftCertificateBySeveralTags

      @Query(value="SELECT DISTINCT (gc.id), gc.name, gc.description, gc.price, gc.duration, gc.create_date, gc.update_date FROM gift_certificate gc JOIN certificate_tag gct JOIN tag t ON gc.id = gct.certificate_id AND t.id = gct.tag_id AND t.name IN (:tags) LIMIT :pageFrom,:pageTo", nativeQuery=true) List<GiftCertificate> getGiftCertificateBySeveralTags(@Param("tags") Set<String> tags, @Param("pageFrom") Integer pageFrom, @Param("pageTo") Integer pageTo)

    • updateGiftCertificateById

      @Transactional @Modifying @Query("update GiftCertificate g set g.name = ?2, g.description = ?3, g.duration = ?4, g.price = ?5, g.createDate = ?6, g.updateDate = ?7 where g.id = ?1") void updateGiftCertificateById(Long id, String name, String description, int duration, BigDecimal price, LocalDate createDate, LocalDate updateDate)
